items.content_html:
This should be merged after my fleet of typo fix PRs.

This PR splits our custom dictionaries by topic, making them easier to maintain and inspect. It could also allow for more granular options in the future, such as whether each one should provide suggestions, or whether they should be case-sensitive.

@OnkarRuikar @bsmth
items.title: Reorganize custom dictionaries, better spell checking infra

items.content_html:
I am fixing a lot of nits in content. The goal is to make our custom dictionaries as small as possible by eliminating things that could be better recognized as words. This not only helps with automation but helps with human readers too, especially those who may be slow to recognize words.

  • About half of them are code not properly capitalized.
  • There are some real typos.
  • Occasionally I have to refactor the wording a bit.
  • Where we are demonstrating real typos, I use inline cSpell:ignore to prevent it being ignored in other files.

items.content_html:
per : https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/MDN/Writing_guidelines/Writing_style_guide#see_also_section, removed "mapped logical properties" text in see also sections.
ordered the see also in some cases, also added the module or other related props when missing.
items.title: See also: remove text, add modules

items.content_html:
Description

https://webidl.spec.whatwg.org/#idl-DOMException;
https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/common-dom-interfaces.html#the-domstringlist-interface;
https://drafts.fxtf.org/geometry/;

I believe these are the rest of all.

Motivation

Additional details

Related issues and pull requests
items.title: Add {{AvailableInWorkers}} for DOM-relates and Fix {{APIRef}}

items.content_html:
Description

Firefox 132 ships the fetch() keepalive option in Nightly and early Beta builds.

This PR:

  • Adds a Fx132 experimental rel note and an entry in the experimental features page.
  • Improves the description on the RequestInit page.
  • Adds a keepalive property page, hanging off the Request interface page.

See https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1906952 for the shipping bug.

Motivation

Additional details

Related issues and pull requests

Docs issue: #36120
items.title: Add rel notes for Fx132 fetch() keepalive support, and tweak docs

items.content_html:
Description

see spec at https://drafts.css-houdini.org/css-typed-om/, note that though the spec defines many interfaces also expose to worker scope (and worklet scope), but most of them have not implemented yet, so add these two at present is enough

test using https://worker-playground.glitch.me/

Motivation

Additional details

Related issues and pull requests

items.content_html:
Description

Added the new noopener-allow-popup COOP value

Motivation

To inform developers of this new header value.

Additional details

Related issues and pull requests

Fixes mdn/mdn#579
Related to whatwg/html#10394
items.title: Coop noopener allow popups
